dcterms:creator: M. Nadeem
A. Bethke
S. Reddy
dcterms:description: StereoSet is a dataset designed to measure stereotypical bias in pretrained language models, organized in pairs or triples of minimally distant sentences that differ only in the word(s) carrying a stereotypical connotation.
dcterms:title: StereoSet

dcterms:creator: N. Nangia
C. Vania
R. Bhalerao
S. R. Bowman
dcterms:description: Crows-Pairs is a challenge dataset for measuring social biases in masked language models, organized in pairs of minimally distant sentences that differ only in one word, usually the one describing a social group.
dcterms:title: Crows-Pairs

dcterms:creator: B. Mathew
P. Saha
S. M. Yimam
C. Biemann
P. Goyal
A. Mukherjee
dcterms:description: HateXplain is a benchmark dataset for explainable hate speech detection, containing posts from social media annotated with their ground-truth toxicity scores and the social groups they target.
dcterms:title: HateXplain
